text: Kalpani railway station () is located in Mardan, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Mardan District Category:Railway stations on Nowshera–Dargai Railway Line Category:Defunct railway stations in Mardan District
title: Kalpani railway station
